channel.title: Logging problem
channel.description: A person can log onto another players account by putting their username and any password and mass clicking login how can I fix this?

item.title: Logging problem
item.dc:creator: @openice123 openice123
item.description:
@openice123 wrote:

find your login method
then in there add something like

if(boolean) { try { int++; } if(int >=5) { some stuff here.... s.close } catch(IOException IOE) {} else { login stuff here.... }

thatd be like a login exception so if they get the pass wrong more then 5 times it closes the client
youâ€™ll have to fix the errors its just a thought
